Text.Page:
That cursed Mysterium! Allemantheia won't send more troops to help with our sloth problem because apparently sloths "aren't carnivores." Insanity!

Have you seen the teeth on the {@LinkCreature:30#110#sloth slashers}? Sharp enough to...oh, now there's an idea.

Will you help a fellow soldier? Kill some {@LinkCreature:30#110#sloth slashers} and bring me some teeth I can send to my commander?
Excellent. When I'm at my next briefing, I'll throw these in their faces!
Kill those {@LinkCreature:30#110#sloth slashers} and pull their fangs.
